湶字的基本解释

湶
quán
水名。
古同“泉”。

湶字的汉语字典释义

[①]［quán］
［《廣韻》疾緣切，平仙，從。］
亦作“湶1”。亦作“灥2”。
(1)泉水。
(2)泛指江河湖海之水。
(3)地下水。
(4)泉下。指人死后埋葬的地方。
(5)古代钱币的名称。
(6)姓。北周有泉企。见《周书》本传。

湶字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　湶； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页638第34
與泉同。【字牖】引漢相孫君碑，波障湶漑。

湶字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
湶字的起名意思

同“泉”，也是水名。

Chu
Basic explanation of words
Chu
quán
Water name.
The ancient same "spring".
Chu
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［quán］
["Guangyun" Jiyuanqi, Pingxian, from. ]
Also known as "湶1". Also known as "Hu 2".
(1) Spring water.
(2) Refers to the water of rivers, lakes and seas.
(3) Groundwater.
(4) Spring under. Refers to the place where a person is buried after death.
(5) The names of ancient coins.
(6) Last name. There are spring enterprises in the Northern Zhou Dynasty. See the biography of "Book of Zhou".
Chu
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　湶; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 638 34
Same as spring. 【Word 牖】citing the monument of Sun Jun, the Han dynasty.

Name meaning
Same as "spring", but also the name of water.
